title: Turkey Beachfront Hideaway in Milas with 10,000sqm Day Spa
description: Five-star luxury, holistic health practices and jaw-dropping Aegean Sea panoramas are just the beginning at Six Senses Kaplankaya. The stand-out facility at this superb hotel is the 10,000sqm spa, spanning two floors and boasting an indoor heated pool, hydrothermal areas, hammams, state-of-the-art fitness equipment and classes including spinning, yoga and pilates. Indulge wholesomely at a selection of health-focused dining venues: Sage & Sea offers buffet-style evening meals based on Mediterranean and Turkish cooking; Wild Thyme puts a modern twist on pan-Asian cuisine; Meze by the Sea serves fresh seafood and is set on a small, romantically lit headland; and The Alchemy Bar crafts raw-food and herb-based delights.
offer_address: Bozbük, Merkez Sokak No:198, 48200 Milas/Muğla, Turkey
